value.name: Jamaal Bowman topples US Rep. Engel in NY Democratic primary
value.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Former middle school principal Jamaal Bowman has toppled 16-term U.S. Rep. Eliot Engel in New York's Democratic primary in another upset victory for the party's insurgent wing.
